doc.after: Unlike many large businesses subsequent to its formation Amtrak has had only one active investor the U S government Like most investors the federal government has demanded a degree of accountability Determination of congressional funding and selection of Amtrak s leadership have been infused with political considerations As discussed below funding levels and capital support have varied over time
